Class DeficitSolver

java.lang.Object
DeficitSolver
public class DeficitSolver extends Object
DeficitSolver class for the Prediction Team module. Declares methods used to analyze a financial deficit and determine adjustments/reductions to achieve a balanced budget.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    DeficitSolver()
    Default constructor for the DataReader class.

  • Constructor Details

    • DeficitSolver

      public DeficitSolver()
      Default constructor for the DataReader class. Initializes the object without any parameters. * @author Sahadat Amzad

  • Method Details

    • calculateDeficit

      public double calculateDeficit()
      Calculates the user's total financial deficit.
      Returns:
      the total deficit amount; returns 0 if there is no deficit

    • identifyAdjustments

      public Object identifyAdjustments()
      Identifies possible adjustments to reduce expenses and eliminate the deficit.
      Returns:
      a list of recommended expense reductions for each category

    • generateSummary

      public String generateSummary()
      Generates a summary of the user's financial deficit and proposed adjustments.
      Returns:
      string detailing a summary of the deficit and adjustment plan

    • applyAdjustments

      public boolean applyAdjustments()
      Applies the identified adjustments to the user's expense data.
      Returns:
      true if the adjustments are successful, false otherwise

    • undoAdjustment

      public boolean undoAdjustment()
      Reverts previously applied adjustments to restore the original expense data.
      Returns:
      true if the adjustments are successfully undone; false otherwise
